name: In the ESTATE OF Arthur STEWART, Deceased. Emma MARTIN, James Martin, Joseph Martin, David Engle, Everett A. Keene, Ray Engle, and Walter Tood, Jr., Appellants v. Eva S. HIBBERT

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: In the ESTATE OF Arthur STEWART, Deceased. Emma MARTIN, James Martin, Joseph Martin, David Engle, Everett A. Keene, Ray Engle, and Walter Tood, Jr., Appellants v. Eva S. HIBBERT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order, 325 Pa.Super. 545, 473 A.2d 572, affirmed.
HUTCHINSON, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Melvin E. Newcomer, Lancaster, for appellants.
James W. Appel, Lancaster, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
485 A.2d 391
In the ESTATE OF Arthur STEWART, Deceased. Emma MARTIN, James Martin, Joseph Martin, David Engle, Everett A. Keene, Ray Engle, and Walter Tood, Jr., Appellants v. Eva S. HIBBERT.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 3, 1984.
Decided Dec. 14, 1984.
Melvin E. Newcomer, Lancaster, for appellants.
James W. Appel, Lancaster, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
